channel.title: Hey need help with co-owner and owner(Delta)
channel.description: Hey all So recently i decided to give my bestfriend(and administrator) co-owner. Thing is,i wanna make it clear that he is co and i am owner. So i was wondering what ways i could do this. Aside from simply telling people,i need to make a way to make it absolutely clear I have changed starting mesage,::info all that,but i was wondering if there were more ways? Also,i would like some better owner commands for my new co-owner to expierience. If someone could give me a ::kill command,that would be good,but it would be nice to have some more armour commands,maybe animations? I know i should just work it out,but im just tryin to quickly do it to suprise my best mate (he dont know he is co-owner yet)and then he will be able to have fun with the commands. Thanks Pasta186

no prob man, add me if u like =)

item.title: Hey need help with co-owner and owner(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @canio22 canio22
item.description:
@canio22 wrote:

mayby a drop command?
Mayby a test area?
Codes are on delta tho…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("testarea")) {
toX = 2601;
toY = 4717;
sM("You have teleported To The Test area");
}

Mayby a owner zone?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("oz") && (playerRights >= 3)) { toX = 2898; toY = 3561; sM("You have teleported to the Co-Owner+ Zone"); }
also you could have a tele all command

if (command.equals("xteleall") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client castOn = (client) p; p.toX = absX; p.toY = absY; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Hey need help with co-owner and owner(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @canio22 canio22
item.description:
@canio22 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";
 if (donator == 1) {
 titles = "[Donator]-";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {titles = "[Moderator]-";
}
 if (playerRights == 2) {titles = "[Administrator]-";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {titles = "[CO-OWNER]-";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("canio22")) {
titles = "[OWNER]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "+ command.substring(5));
}

just change canio22 to ur name and ur done =)

Read full topic

item.title: Hey need help with co-owner and owner(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all
So recently i decided to give my bestfriend(and administrator) co-owner. Thing is,i wanna make it clear that he is co and i am owner. So i was wondering what ways i could do this. Aside from simply telling people,i need to make a way to make it absolutely clear
I have changed starting mesage,::info all that,but i was wondering if there were more ways?
Also,i would like some better owner commands for my new co-owner to expierience. If someone could give me a ::kill command,that would be good,but it would be nice to have some more armour commands,maybe animations?
I know i should just work it out,but im just tryin to quickly do it to suprise my best mate (he dont know he is co-owner yet)and then he will be able to have fun with the commands.
Thanks
Pasta186
